long_description: Easy-to-use, water-based Nikwax Softshell Proof 2.0 treatment improves water repellency and maintains breathability of soft-shell outerwear garments. Recommended for Gore Windstopper(R), Schoeller(R) soft shell, Polartec Windbloc(R) and Polartec(R) soft-shell fabrics; not intended for use on fleece. Environmentally safe formula; treats up to 3 garments. Pre-clean garments with Nikwax(R) Tech Wash (sold separately) before using Nikwax Softshell Proof 2.0 treatment.
short_description: Easy-to-use, water-based Nikwax Softshell Proof 2.0 treatment improves water repellency and maintains breathability of soft-shell outerwear garments.
